title: Google Search on the desktop may soon receive Lens integration
content:
Google Lens is an immensely powerful image recognition tool that lets you visually search the world around you. You can reverse search images, identify plants and animals, scan codes, extract and translate text, and a lot more. Originally limited to smartphones, Google expanded this powerful tool to the desktop via the Chrome browser integration last

The post Google Search on the desktop may soon receive Lens integration appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Users who have received the feature as part of A/B testing are seeing a colorful Google Lens icon appearing in the search box.
